io.micronaut.serde.support.serdes

Interface TemporalSerde<T extends java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The generic type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Deserializer<T>, NullableDeserializer<T>, NullableSerde<T>, Serde<T>, Serializer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFormattedTemporalSerde, InstantSerde, LocalDateSerde, LocalDateTimeSerde, LocalTimeSerde, OffsetDateTimeSerde, YearSerde, ZonedDateTimeSerde

    public interface TemporalSerde<T extends java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor>
extends NullableSerde<T>
    Interface for serializing and deserializing temporals.
